title: AI Blueprint Templates
description: Create Believable Artificial Intelligence with these simple templates!
longDescription:
The Simple AI Blueprint Templates provide a base for the creation of believable AI which allows you to create enemies with various behavior in minutes. It is 100% done in Blueprints and is very easy to set up.

You can customise parameters, such as: Animation, movement speed, radius in which enemy will detect the player, and so on. And you can set enemies to patrol a certain area of a level, or they can stand still, go near the player.


UPDATE:

Changed distribution type from project to asset pack for better integration,

Minor bug fixes,

Additional AI - Random point movement AI
technicalDetails:
Number of Blueprints:

  • 1 Demo Level with all AI's 
  • 1 move to player AI
  • 1 move near to player AI
  • 1 play animation when near player AI
  • 1 patrolling AI 
  • Random point movement AI

Does NOT use Behaviour Trees, purely Blueprint


Preview Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6vZRQqu000Y

Update Video: [COMING SOON]


Intended Platform: All 

Platforms Tested: Windows 

Documentation Included: No

releaseInfo.releaseNote: 4.16 and 4.17 support, added new AI on 12/03/18 (UK calender) that moves in random direction

Includes 5 basic AI:
Move to player AI,
Move Near Player AI,
Play animation (death) Near player),
Patrolling AI,
Move to random point
